name: Project Icarus
description:
Project Icarus is a aesthetically-charged space flight game that lets you explore the stars on wings of wireframes, barrel dodge space junk, and find your way back to the Sunshine State. 

Made for the 2018 Indie Galactic Space Jam for SpaceX, NASA, and Indienomicon!

Team ZeroSky is comprised of:
Stephen 'Trey' Atwood
Adam Cohen
Austin Pinzon
Angel Rodriguez
Ryan Stunkel
